metadata.title: CVE-2022-31147 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The jQuery Validation Plugin (jquery-validation) provides drop-invalidation for forms. Versions of jquery-validation prior to 1.19.5 arevulnerable to regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) when an attackeris able to supply arbitrary input to the url2 method. This is due to anincomplete fix for CVE-2021-43306. Users should upgrade to version 1.19.5to receive a patch.

criterions.comment: civicrm package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
